main event: A civilian observer watched a star-like object with varying colors over a period of 20 minutes on December 13, 1966.
interesting points: The object changed colors from white to blue-green and back to white before disappearing., The observer noted the object was stationary while the stars were moving., The observed light had a stellar magnitude consistent with an astronomical object., The report came from a page related to Project Blue Book, investigating UFO sightings., There was no physical evidence or photographs associated with the sighting.
